content: this is a crochet pattern for a square coaster with a heart in the center pattern details technique required tapestry crochet terminology standard us crochet terms finished product size approx 4 25 x 4 25 materials yarn hook needed 4mm crochet hook yarn needed lily sugar n cream or any worsted weight #4 cotton yarn in two contrasting colors get the pattern for free here and learn how to do two-directional flat tapestry crochet https //havencrochetdesigns com/how-to-do-flat-tapestry-crochet-2/
